### Problem 1: Text Problem 10.2

## (a)

```{r, echo=TRUE}
n<-100
for(i in 1:n){
y <- rnorm(n, 8, 4)
ybar <- mean(y)
}
ybar
```
So the approximate posterior mean $E(\theta_1 \mid y) = 8.011$. The standard deviation is 4.082841.
